name: Singular point(Prototype)
description:
Singular point is currently a prototype for a 3rd person open-world game where the player has to collect enemy souls to keep themselves alive in a post-apocalyptic sci-fi grassland and desert. 

In this prototype, you fight turrets, robots and gain a new weapon along your journey to make it to the end. 

NEWS:

The idea is currently being fleshed out so the game will look and play drastically differently than the next version. 

NEXT UPDATE: What you should expect from the next version is an updated combat system and map for you to explore on your hoverbike.

THE TEAM:

If you saw potential or liked the game follow us on Twitter at @Slip_00 for more updates on the game. 

Thanks for playing

From the Slip team
